name: Last Rebirth
description:
A Choice

Insanity is what this has become. A twisted purpose you cannot leave behind. Even you must admit that there is no end. I mean what do you fight for, what drives you to continue down this path of madness? 

Is it the sacrifice that means the world yet nothing to what you care for? The peace that even war finds disgusting or are you searching for an answer that will never exist?

I'm tired and I'm sure you are also tired. Let me end it for both of us. 

Overview

Last Rebirth is an interactive novel set in a post-apocalypse world. It is entirely text-based and your choices control the direction the story goes. The game is currently under development so please feel free to voice your opinions on aspects you do not find satisfactory.

Note

If you are finding it hard to see in Light mode (Still a kink or two to work out) please go to the game settings and switch to Dark mode.
